alert.note: Alert for Eastern Mackinac; Mackinac Island, Bois Blanc Island; Southeast Chippewa (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued November 18 at 2:17PM EST until November 19 at 1:00PM EST by NWS Gaylord
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 1 PM EST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Heavy lake effect snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 5 to 11 inches with locally higher amounts possible. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph late tonight through Saturday. * WHERE...Southeast Chippewa, Eastern Mackinac and Mackinac Island/Bois Blanc Island Counties. * WHEN...Until 1 PM EST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. The hazardous conditions could impact the evening commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow accumulation will vary greatly across parts of Mackinac and Chippewa counties. The heaviest accumulation is expected east of Interstate 75 and south of M-48.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Mackinac; Mackinac Island, Bois Blanc Island; Southeast Chippewa
